name: Journey to the Center of Hawkthorne
name_original: Journey to the Center of Hawkthorne
description:
A 2D platformer / RPG based on Community's Digital Estate Planning episode. The game is open-source and community-run, so we're always looking for help.

  • Characters
  • Game Sprites
  • Soundtrack
  • Sound effects
  • Community Chiptunes
Development

All discussion and development takes place on /r/hawkthorne. If you have any contributions you'd like to submit, either open a pull request or create a post on the subreddit
